content: the aiyu tee is a fitted summer crop top with flutter sleeves and lace edging details the seamless set-in sleeve construction is designed for plant fibre yarn typical set-in sleeve construction requires shortrows which creates unsightly holes if you are using plant fibres this construction overcomes that problem of course you can also make the aiyu tee with animal fibre yarn if you wish the tee is worked top down with optional waist shaping you begin by knitting flat for the front and back neckline then stitches are picked up for sleevecaps sleeve and body increases are done through a combination of knitting in the round and knitting flat the body is knitted in the round sleeves are picked up and knitted in the round **skill level ** advanced beginner to intermediate pattern involves lots of picking up stitches putting stitches on hold shortrows and minor lacework **garment bust circumferences** sizes 1 2 3 4 5 6 \ 7 8 9\ centimetres 69 5 79 5 90 100 110 120 5 \ 130 5 140 5 151\ inches 27 5 31 5 35 5 39 5 43 5 47 5 \ 51 5 55 5 59 5\ the tee is designed to have about 4 cm 1 5 inches of negative ease around the bust **garment waist circumferences** this only applies if you do optional waist shaping centimetres 57 5 68 81 91 101 5 112 \ 123 135 143 5\ inches 22 75 26 75 32 35 75 40 44 25 \ 48 5 53 56 5\ **suggested yarn** scheepjes stone washed sport weight 78% cotton 22% acrylic 130 m per 50 g ball sample is in 818 lilac quartz **yarn quantities** with optional waist shaping 4 4 5 5 6 6 \ 7 7 8\ balls without waist shaping 5 5 6 6 7 7 \ 8 9 9\ balls **needles and gauge** 3 5 mm 10 or suitable small circumference circular needles for sleeve 3 5 mm 16 or suitable medium circumference circular needles for body 3 5 mm 32 or suitable large circumference circular needles for yoke using 3 5 mm needles in stockinette 22 stitches and 30 row = 10 cm by 10 cm swatch
